summary: Removes staggering from dual casting from weaker novice spells. Keeping even a dragon constantly staggered makes the game boring. This mod removes the staggering caused by dual cast lightning, fire, and frost when the spell is novice.
descriptionHtml: Removes staggering from dual casting from weaker novice spells. Keeping even a dragon constantly staggered makes the game boring. This mod removes the staggering caused by dual cast lightning, fire, and frost when the spell is novice.
author: Samo187x
